name: xstream
description: An extremely intuitive, small, and fast functional reactive stream library for JavaScript

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha && npm run doctest
scripts.page-content: npm run compile && rm -rf .ignore/ && mkdirp .ignore/ && npm run changelog && node tools/make-toc.js && node tools/make-factories.js && node tools/make-methods.js && cat markdown/header.md markdown/generated-toc.md markdown/overview.md markdown/generated-factories.md markdown/generated-methods.md markdown/footer.md > .ignore/content.md
scripts.extra-docs: node tools/make-extras.js && rm EXTRA_DOCS.md && cp markdown/generated-extras.md EXTRA_DOCS.md
scripts.readme: npm run page-content && cat markdown/readme-title.md .ignore/content.md > README.md
scripts.predist: rm -rf dist/ && mkdirp dist/ && npm run compile
scripts.dist: browserify index.js --standalone xstream | node tools/strip-comments.js > dist/xstream.js
scripts.version: npm run readme && npm run dist && git add -A
scripts.postversion: git push origin master && git push origin --tags && npm publish && npm run update-gh-pages
scripts.update-gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && rm _includes/content.md && cp .ignore/content.md _includes/ && git add --all && if git diff --cached --quiet > /dev/null; then :; else git commit -m "update site"; fi && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout master
scripts.release-minor: npm version minor -m "chore(package): release new version"
scripts.release-major: npm version major -m "chore(package): release new version"

author: Andre Staltz <andre+npm@staltz.com> (http://andre.staltz.com/)
